ing: 2 (8 ounce) cans sliced water chestnuts, drained
des: "Spicy (but not too hot!), crunchy, flavorful dip. Tastes delicious on buttery, round crackers or finger sandwiches. The longer it is allowed to marinate, the better it tastes."
ins:
Julienne the water chestnuts.
In a medium bowl, mix the water chestnuts, vegetable soup mix, sour cream, mayonnaise, hot sauce and green onion. Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.
